oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Artists From Around The World - Nashville television program
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of a live taping in Nashville for television program Country Artists From Around The World, featuring Larry Cunningham (performer), Gordie Tapp (host/performer), Gary Buck (performer), Pat Campbell (host), and Rick McKenna (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Gordie Tapp; Gary Buck; Larry Cunningham
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) [Unidentified] introduces some notable audience members in attendance -- (00:30) [Unidentified] introduces Pat Campbell -- (00:50) Pat Campbell addresses audience members from England, and introduces some of the cast members and performers -- (04:00) [Unidentified] talks about this show being televised, and it being the first CMA sponsored show featuring various artists from around the world -- (04:40) Campbell introduces Bill Walker and his guests -- (05:40) Campbell introduces Rick McKenna -- (06:36) [Unidentified tune] (Rick McKenna) -- (09:18) Pat Campbell talks with McKenna about recording, and thanks the producers and workers who put on the program -- (10:30) Campbell introduces Jim Weir -- (12:18) [Unidentified] introduces Gordie Tapp -- (13:00) Tapp talks and introduces the program -- (14:00) Many Others (Gordie Tapp) -- (16:40) Tapp talks about the various nationalities present at the show -- (17:20) Many Others (Gordie Tapp) (incomplete) -- (17:45) Tapp introduces Gary Buck -- (18:18) It Takes Time (Gary Buck) -- (20:47) Gary Buck thanks the audience and introduces the next tune -- (21:05) Saunders' Ferry Lane (Gary Buck) -- (24:23) Tapp thanks Buck and introduces Larry Cunningham -- (24:58) I Guess I Better Go (Larry Cunningham) -- (27:47) (That's How I Learned To Love) That Good Old Country Music (Larry Cunningham) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cunningham, Larry (Vocalist); Tapp, Gordie, 1922-2016;
